org.sql: SELECT follow_requests.* FROM follow_requests WHERE follow_requests.target_account_id = "$1" AND follow_requests.account_id IN ("$2", "$3", "$4")

rewrites.sql: SELECT follow_requests.* FROM follow_requests WHERE follow_requests.target_account_id = "$1" AND follow_requests.account_id IN ("$2", "$3", "$4") LIMIT 1
